head.title: A New Agency Opening in New York

hedline.hl1: A New Agency Opening in New York

abstract.p: Longtime advertising agency executives George Lois and Lois Wyse are opening agency Lois & Lois in New York (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Two longtime agency executives are opening a new shop.
George Lois and Lois Wyse are opening Lois & Lois in New York with assignments that include a print campaign for the Clairol Loving Care brand of hair color, part of the Bristol-Myers Squibb Company.
Two longtime agency executives are opening a new shop.
George Lois and Lois Wyse are opening Lois & Lois in New York with assignments that include a print campaign for the Clairol Loving Care brand of hair color, part of the Bristol-Myers Squibb Company.

Mr. Lois, 67, had most recently been co-chairman and co-chief executive at Lois/USA in New York, which filed for bankruptcy last fall. Mr. Lois said that the bankruptcy -- one of the largest recent such filings by a major national agency -- had been settled.
Ms. Wyse, who declined to give her age, had most recently been president at Wyse Advertising in Cleveland, where she remains a partner.
